channel.title: Posts on Cupertino Choraliers
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Cupertino Choraliers

item.title: Summer News
item.description: This where periodic news updates can go. Technical stuff below. Below are some examples of Markdown to see how it is rendered in the browser. http://example.org/posts/ H1 H2 H3 H4 H5 H6 Alternatively, for H1 and H2, an underline-ish style: Alt-H1 Alt-H2 Emphasis, aka italics, with asterisks or underscores. Strong emphasis, aka bold, with asterisks or underscores. Combined emphasis with asterisks and underscores. Strikethrough uses two tildes. Scratch this.
